projectData.title: Group Chat App
projectData.description: A real-time group messaging platform built with Express.js, featuring live chat rooms, user management, and a simple clean interface using raw HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
projectData.fullDescription:
Key features include:

- Create and manage group chats with ease.
- Generate one-time use invite codes for secure access.
- Assign or remove admin roles within groups.
- Kick or remove members when needed.
- Simple interface focused on group collaboration.
